posts.post_content: I have a Topps 206 Fred Payne with a polar bear back I am looking to sell for $75. Email me at [url]fisher29norris@gmail.com[/url] if you’re interested and want to see some pics! Thank you!

I think you are going to need to figure out how to post scans if you are going to sell on BST.  Fairly easy process - set up a free upload account (such as flickr) - Upload to there and then use the "share" link that is generated with each upload to post on the boards.

BTW - I would like to take a look at your Payne card - [url]lnagel@iland.net[/url]

GL
